text: anyone have any idea how to implement this mulitstep form integrated in hs blog?
I _think_ there is a beta for multi-step forms out
not sure who would be the person for that

Im creating a custom module group. I prototyped it with styles added in the drag and drop builder on a page template. Can i or should I use the source of the module group and simply replace the hubl tags in order to create a custom reusable module group that matches my prototype - is this a good or bad idea? It basically worked - not sure if this is a good method to build a custom module (module group). Thanks for any input!
